import * as T from 'fp-ts/Task';
import { AppError } from '@/types/error.types';

const fetchDataSafe = (): TE.TaskEither<AppError, Data> =>
  TE.tryCatch(
    () => fetchData(),
    (error): AppError => ({
      type: 'FETCH_ERROR',
      message: `è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: ${String(error)}`,
      cause: error,
    })
  );

// ä½¿ç”¨
pipe(
  fetchDataSafe(),
  TE.fold(
    (error) => T.of(logger.error('[Module] è·å–å¤±è´¥', error)),
    (data) => T.of(processData(data))
  )
)();
```

    () => fetchData(),

)();

âœ… ä¿®å¤æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š
  æ­¥éª¤ 1: å°† try-catch æ›¿æ¢ä¸º TE.tryCatch()
  æ­¥éª¤ 2: å®šä¹‰æ˜ç¡®çš„é”™è¯¯ç±»å‹ AppError
  æ­¥éª¤ 3: ä½¿ç”¨ pipe() ç»„åˆæ“ä½œ

ğŸ“‹ ä¿®å¤åçš„ä»£ç ï¼š
```typescript
import { pipe } from 'fp-ts/function';
import * as TE from 'fp-ts/TaskEither';
import * as T from 'fp-ts/Task';
import { AppError } from '@/types/error.types';

const fetchDataSafe = (): TE.TaskEither<AppError, Data> =>
  TE.tryCatch(
    () => fetchData(),
    (error): AppError => ({
      type: 'FETCH_ERROR',
      message: `è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: ${String(error)}`,
      cause: error,
    })
  );

// ä½¿ç”¨
pipe(
  fetchDataSafe(),
  TE.fold(
    (error) => T.of(logger.error('[Module] è·å–å¤±è´¥', error)),
    (data) => T.of(processData(data))
  )
)();
```

ğŸ“‹ ä¿®å¤åçš„ä»£ç ï¼š
```typescript
import { pipe } from 'fp-ts/function';
import * as TE from 'fp-ts/TaskEither';
import * as T from 'fp-ts/Task';
import { AppError } from '@/types/error.types';

const fetchDataSafe = (): TE.TaskEither<AppError, Data> =>
  TE.tryCatch(
    () => fetchData(),
    (error): AppError => ({
      type: 'FETCH_ERROR',
      message: `è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: ${String(error)}`,
      cause: error,
    })
  );

// ä½¿ç”¨
pipe(
  fetchDataSafe(),
  TE.fold(
    (error) => T.of(logger.error('[Module] è·å–å¤±è´¥', error)),
    (data) => T.of(processData(data))
  )
)();
```

  TE.fold(
    (error) => T.of(logger.error('[Module] è·å–å¤±è´¥', error)),
    (data) => T.of(processData(data))
  )
)();
```

import * as TE from 'fp-ts/TaskEither';
import * as T from 'fp-ts/Task';
import { AppError } from '@/types/error.types';

const fetchDataSafe = (): TE.TaskEither<AppError, Data> =>
  TE.tryCatch(
    () => fetchData(),
    (error): AppError => ({
      type: 'FETCH_ERROR',
      message: `è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: ${String(error)}`,
      cause: error,
    })

  TE.fold(

    (data) => T.of(processData(data))
  )
)();

const fetchDataSafe = (): TE.TaskEither<AppError, Data> =>
  TE.tryCatch(
    () => fetchData(),
    (error): AppError => ({
      type: 'FETCH_ERROR',
      message: `è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: ${String(error)}`,
      cause: error,
    })
  );

// ä½¿ç”¨
pipe(
  fetchDataSafe(),
  TE.fold(
    (error) => T.of(logger.error('[Module] è·å–å¤±è´¥', error)),
    (data) => T.of(processData(data))
  )
)();
```

  const results: string[] = [];

  });

ğŸ” é”™è¯¯åŸå› ï¼š
  forEach é¼“åŠ±å‰¯ä½œç”¨ç¼–ç¨‹ï¼š
  - é€šå¸¸ç”¨äºä¿®æ”¹å¤–éƒ¨çŠ¶æ€
  - æ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œéš¾ä»¥ç»„åˆ
  - ä¸å¦‚ map/filter/reduce è¡¨è¾¾æ„å›¾

ğŸ—ï¸ æ¶æ„åŸåˆ™ï¼š
  ä½¿ç”¨å£°æ˜å¼æ•°ç»„æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
    - map: è½¬æ¢æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
    - filter: ç­›é€‰å…ƒç´ 
    - reduce: èšåˆä¸ºå•ä¸ªå€¼
    - flatMap: è½¬æ¢å¹¶å±•å¹³

âœ… ä¿®å¤æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š
  æ­¥éª¤ 1: åˆ†æ forEach çš„å®é™…ç”¨é€”
  æ­¥éª¤ 2: å¦‚æœæ˜¯è½¬æ¢ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ map
  æ­¥éª¤ 3: å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç­›é€‰ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ filter
  æ­¥éª¤ 4: å¦‚æœæ˜¯èšåˆï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ reduce

ğŸ“‹ ä¿®å¤åçš„ä»£ç ï¼š
```typescript
// âŒ é”™è¯¯åšæ³•
const results: string[] = [];
items.forEach(item => {
  results.push(item.name);
});

// âœ… æ­£ç¡®åšæ³• - ä½¿ç”¨ map
const results = items.map(item => item.name);

// âœ… æ­£ç¡®åšæ³• - ä½¿ç”¨ filter + map
const activeNames = items
  .filter(item => item.active)
  .map(item => item.name);

// âœ… æ­£ç¡®åšæ³• - ä½¿ç”¨ reduce
const total = items.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.value, 0);

// âœ… æ­£ç¡®åšæ³• - ä½¿ç”¨ fp-ts
import { pipe } from 'fp-ts/function';
import * as A from 'fp-ts/Array';

const results = pipe(
  items,
  A.map(item => item.name)
);
```

ğŸ“š å‚è€ƒæ–‡æ¡£ï¼š#fp-patterns - æ•°ç»„æ“ä½œ
ğŸ“‹ Steering æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š#code-standards - å£°æ˜å¼ç¼–ç¨‹

ğŸ”— ç›¸å…³è§„åˆ™ï¼šno-mutation, prefer-map                                                                                                                                                                                                                 grain/no-mutation

    () => fetchData(),
    (error): AppError => ({

      message: `è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: ${String(error)}`,

  TE.tryCatch(
    () => fetchData(),

    () => fetchData(),
    (error): AppError => ({
      type: 'FETCH_ERROR',
      message: `è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: ${String(error)}`,
      cause: error,
    })
  );

// ä½¿ç”¨
pipe(
  fetchDataSafe(),
  TE.fold(
    (error) => T.of(logger.error('[Module] è·å–å¤±è´¥', error)),
    (data) => T.of(processData(data))
  )
)();
```
